data.title: Underwater Basket Weaving
data.description: Learn to make baskets underwater. Warning: Moist

data.title: Angular Developer Testing
data.description: In a DevOps environment, developers take responsibility for the quality (internal and external) of their applications and their build and test pipelines. This course will emphasize the process for creating automated tests for our Angular applications, including low-level Unit Tests, and Isolated Integration Tests.
